ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t believe the runes are restricted to magic casting or magical monsters. As an example, I ve found the Words of Tyranny and Element (and a few others I
ygData.messageBody:
I don't believe the runes are restricted to magic casting or magical monsters. As an example, I've found the Words of Tyranny and Element (and a few others I can't recall off hand right now) off of Griffawns and Scythe beetles in North Karana.

Trev

-----Original Message-----
From: TkAdam@... [SMTP:TkAdam@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 10:28 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Location of Runes

From: TkAdam@...

There is no "specific" monster to look for them.

They are randomly found items. You find them on magical, or magic using
creatures. So you can't say "go to Rathe, and kill Bob the evil mage" You
have to say... "Go to lavastorm, kill elementals. I will trade items I can't
use for items you can't use"

So this mailing list was rally intended to be...

"I have Rune of zapping, page 550000 of the grimoire. I will trade for Word
of smiting, and word of suffering."

But it is nice to have the conversations about spell research it in general
also.

Sonoroud.

------------------------------------------------------------------------
How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
http://www.onelist.com
More than 1,000!
------------------------------------------------------------------------
This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research. Please keep the emails on topic.
